comments.body: This is a lot of examples. Could you trim it back to 3-5?
I think each example denotes different vCenter environment and will help user to write a playbook without trial-error. I want to keep this way.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +54,58 @@      - This parameter is case sensitive.
      - You must specify either a C(folder) or a C(datacenter_name).
      - 'Examples:'
      - '   folder: /datacenter1/datastore'
      - '   folder: datacenter1/datastore'
